name: runFork
signature: { <R>(runtime: Runtime<R>): <A, E>(effect: Effect<A, E, R>, options?: RunForkOptions) => RuntimeFiber<A, E>; <R, A, E>(runtime: Runtime<R>, effect: Effect<A, E, R>, options?: RunForkOptions): RuntimeFiber<A, E>; }
